Activity: Check emails and review any overnight updates. Prioritize tasks for the day.
Facilitate end-of-week sync meeting with all team leads to review progress and plan for next week.

Compile a comprehensive week-end report summarizing progress, challenges, and next steps.
Review the week-end report with @prod-1 and finalize any adjustments.
Send the finalized week-end report to all stakeholders and team members.
